attributes.action: DO NOT embark on funding of the BBC through general taxation without first obtaining a mandate from the people of this land.
attributes.additional_details: For decades the BBC has been misused as a method of misappropriating the licence taxes paid to hugely enrich the executives, managers and performers.  It is the opinion of millions of our citizens that the BBC will NEVER survive as a commercial entity, because of the ethos of personal enrichment of the employees of the organisation, but it should nevertheless NOT be funded through general taxation.
